name: PregnancyAssessmentSurveyQuestionnaire
title: Pregnancy Assessment Survey
description: Te Whatu Ora pregnancy assessment survey.

item.text: Are you currently pregnant or postpartum?
How many live births of viable gestation has the patient had?
Please explain any complications from previous pregnancies
Please explain any symptoms suggestive of pre-eclampsia?
Any signs suggestive of a DVT?
Please explain any symptoms suggestive of a DVT
Please explain any details of your Dysuria
Obstetrician Details and Discussion, including any potential clexane requirement?
Any details surrounding the baby movement?
